name: ifx_fetch_row
purpose: Get row as an associative array

return.description:
Returns an associative array that corresponds to the fetched row, or
   FALSE if there are no more rows.Blob columns are returned as integer blob id values for use in
   ifx_get_blob unless you have used
   ifx_textasvarchar(1) or ifx_byteasvarchar(1), in which case blobs
   are returned as string values.
